moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e5:
Budapest Gambit.
Sharp and full of traps.
moves.3... exd4 4. exd4 Bb4+ 5. Bd2 Bxd2+ 6. N: Rook comes to e-file, while White King is still in center.
moves.8... Ng4:
?!
This is not good move. But playing risky and unnatural moves, make opponent astray.
moves.9. Nf3 Nc6 10. O-O d5: This is good move as breaks center and free the bishop.
moves.11. c5: White's bishop is pretty strong, Black should do something about it.
moves.11... Nb4 12. Bb1: Now a1 rook is temoparay out of play.
moves.12... b6: Black still wants to break center, but this moves intends something else too.
moves.13. a3 Ba6: Bishop attacks knight ... fork ... and win.
moves.14... Qh4:
This is not best. Best one was NxN and win the pawn, center, position ...
Now White has 2 moves h3 and Nf3.
moves.15. h3:
Nf3 was only best move.
"Sometiem Looking Back is Good"
